Fees

Fee Schedule

From Ethereum wallet to Ethereum wallet

Send/receive Euroxes from Ethereum wallet to Ethereum wallet – Ethereum network fees, we don’t charge any fees.

from bank account

Send/receive Euroxes from bank account – 0.1% or 20 EURS whatever is greater.
